__TOC__

Matthew Edmondson is a FOSS advocate, FOSS trainer, FOSS consultant.  He created the first public GNU/Linux training course in Oxford, UK in 2000 and managed the Open Source Project at the National Computing Centre.  Currently he delivers the above through M6-IT, which is a Community Interest Company.  Currently lives in Oxford.
